name: Interstellar Logistics Inc
description: Interstellar Logistics Inc. is an action puzzle game. The player shoots an object from Point A to Point B using the gravity of planets, stars, and black holes while hitting certain points along the way. There's a lot more to the game, but that is the basic idea.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3.00 GHz AMD Phenom II X4 945 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3200 Storage: 850 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is a great game i have played it before and will play it in the future i recommend it to all gamers.
Pretty fun game. Everytime I come back to it, I find it more and more addicting.
